meanings.sent4: The diagnostic of a racing heart can indicate anxiety or excitement.
meanings.sent5: The diagnostic of a rash helped the doctor narrow down the possible illnesses.

meanings.definition: A test or procedure used to identify a disease or condition
meanings.sent1: The blood test was a crucial diagnostic in determining the illness.
